items.name: Z.ai
items.short_description: Z.ai is an AI company offering a free chatbot powered by the GLM-4.5 model.
items.description: Z.ai is an AI company focused on developing Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) for the benefit of humanity. They offer a free AI chatbot powered by their GLM-4.5 model. Their platform includes tools like Auto Think, AI Slides, Full-Stack development assistance, Magic Design, code writing capabilities, and information search. Z.ai also provides an API for integration.
items.descriptionShort: Z.ai is an AI company offering a free chatbot powered by the GLM-4.5 model.
items.revenue_context: Z.ai reported RMB 57.4M revenue in 2022, RMB 124.5M in 2023, RMB 312.4M in 2024, and RMB 190M in H1 2025; 2022â€“2024 CAGR 130%; large-model business drove growth.

items.name: Limitless Labs
items.short_description: Limitless Labs offers a blockchain-based prediction market platform for enhanced decision-making and transparency.
items.description: Limitless Labs operates a prediction market platform utilizing blockchain technology to facilitate decision-making and enhance transparency. The platform allows users to engage in various prediction markets, leveraging advanced algorithms and AI to provide insights and analytics. With a focus on community-driven markets, Limitless Labs differentiates itself by offering a unique user experience and fostering a collaborative environment for traders. The company is positioned to scale rapidly within the growing prediction market sector, attracting a diverse user base and establishing itself as a leader in the space.

founders.title: Co-Founder & Chief of Product, Engineering, Research & Development

items.descriptionShort: Limitless Labs offers a blockchain-based prediction market platform for enhanced decision-making and transparency.
items.revenue_context: X post claims Limitless (LMTS) is doing $4.76M in annual revenue, implying ~4.4x revenue multiple on a $20.8M market cap.
items.tcp: Individuals and organizations interested in prediction markets and blockchain technology.

items.name: ANT.FUN
items.short_description: ANT.FUN is an emerging on-chain trading platform focused on on-chain transactions.
items.description: ANT.FUN is an innovative and emerging on-chain trading platform dedicated to providing secure, transparent, and efficient solutions for on-chain transactions.
items.hqLocation: Hong Kong, Hong Kong, Hong Kong, Asia
items.descriptionShort: ANT.FUN is an emerging on-chain trading platform focused on on-chain transactions.
items.revenue_context: ANT.FUN posted a DefiLlama snapshot showing protocol revenue of $800,475 over the last 7 days and $187,308 over the last 24 hours; the weekly figure annualizes to $41,624,700.

items.name: TimePad
items.short_description: TimePad is a web-based service for event organizers to manage registrations, ticketing, and promotion.
items.description: TimePad is a leading Russian online event management platform that fully automates event registration, payment collection, and promotion. It allows organizers to embed registration forms on their own websites and other platforms, and provides professional check-in tools. The platform lists a wide variety of events in Moscow, including concerts, art exhibitions, excursions, business events, and children's activities, with 1680 events currently available.
items.descriptionShort: TimePad is a web-based service for event organizers to manage registrations, ticketing, and promotion.
items.revenue_context: SPARK data reports 2024 revenue of 319.7M RUB and profit of 5.7M RUB for Timepad.
items.profitability_context: Reported a profit of 5.7M RUB in 2024 (per SPARK), indicating profitability.

items.name: Quai Foundation
items.short_description: Quai Network is a blockchain platform enabling high transaction throughput with EVM compatibility and a decentralized energy dollar.
items.description: Quai Network is a set of EVM-compatible blockchains designed to achieve high transaction throughput (50k+ TPS) without sacrificing decentralization. It introduces a decentralized energy dollar, $Qi, intended to provide predictable value and facilitate seamless transactions on a scalable and programmable Proof-of-Work blockchain. The network aims to create a financial system that is transparent, secure, and fair. Key features include EVM-compatible smart contracts, MEV-resistant transaction ordering, and work-based primitives that enable the transfer of hash compute power. Quai Network utilizes a "braided" blockchain structure with a Prime Chain and multiple Sub Networks to ensure shared security and interoperability, allowing for scalable Proof-of-Work.
items.hqLocation: Austin, Texas, United States, North America
items.descriptionShort: Quai Network is a blockchain platform enabling high transaction throughput with EVM compatibility and a decentralized energy dollar.
items.revenue_context: Captured $82,511.35 in protocol revenue in the initial 10 days following its PoW engine launch, which the company equates to an annualized run rate of approximately $3,011,664.
items.tcp: Developers and businesses in the crypto space
